name: Pixie Cut
description: A short, cropped hairstyle that's chic and low-maintenance. Perfect for highlighting facial features and works well for both face shapes.
generation_prompt_modifier: with a stylish short pixie cut hairstyle, cropped hair, modern and chic

name: Classic Bob
description: A timeless bob that falls between the chin and shoulders. Versatile and elegant for professional and casual settings.
generation_prompt_modifier: with a classic bob haircut, shoulder-length hair, sleek and professional

name: Long Layered Hair
description: Long hair with layers that add volume and movement. Great for creating dimension and softening angular features.
generation_prompt_modifier: with long layered hair, flowing layers, voluminous and bouncy

name: Side-Swept Bangs
description: Soft, side-swept bangs that frame the face beautifully. Can be paired with various lengths to balance face proportions.
generation_prompt_modifier: with side-swept bangs, soft fringe, face-framing layers

name: Beach Waves
description: Relaxed, tousled waves that give a natural, effortless look. Perfect for a casual style and adds texture.
generation_prompt_modifier: with beachy waves, tousled hair, natural wavy texture, effortless style

name: Classic Fade
description: A timeless men's cut with short sides that gradually fade into longer hair on top. Professional and versatile for any occasion.
generation_prompt_modifier: with a classic fade haircut, short sides, well-groomed men's hairstyle, professional appearance

name: Modern Undercut
description: Bold and edgy style with very short or shaved sides and longer hair on top. Perfect for making a statement.
generation_prompt_modifier: with a modern undercut hairstyle, shaved sides, longer top, edgy men's cut

name: Crew Cut
description: Short, practical military-inspired cut that's easy to maintain. Great for active lifestyles and professional settings.
generation_prompt_modifier: with a crew cut hairstyle, short military style, neat and professional men's haircut

name: Modern Pompadour
description: Stylish retro-inspired look with volume on top and shorter sides. Perfect for special occasions and adds height to longer faces.
generation_prompt_modifier: with a modern pompadour hairstyle, voluminous top, slicked back style, sophisticated men's cut

name: Buzz Cut
description: Ultra-short, low-maintenance cut that's perfect for hot weather and athletic activities. Clean and masculine look.
generation_prompt_modifier: with a buzz cut hairstyle, very short hair, clean masculine look, military style

name: Classic Quiff
description: Textured style with height and volume at the front. Combines vintage charm with modern edge and works well for most face shapes.
generation_prompt_modifier: with a classic quiff hairstyle, textured front volume, modern men's styling

name: Long Bob (Lob)
description: A longer version of the classic bob, hitting just above the shoulders. Sophisticated and versatile for professional settings.
generation_prompt_modifier: with a long bob haircut, shoulder-length hair, sleek and modern styling

name: Textured Crop
description: Modern short cut with textured, messy styling on top. Casual yet put-together appearance that works great for square and round faces.
generation_prompt_modifier: with a textured crop hairstyle, messy textured top, modern casual men's cut

name: Curtain Bangs
description: Face-framing bangs that part in the middle and sweep to both sides. Perfect for heart and long face shapes.
generation_prompt_modifier: with curtain bangs, center-parted fringe, face-framing layers

name: Slicked Back
description: Sophisticated style with hair combed straight back. Perfect for formal events and business settings, adds length to round faces.
generation_prompt_modifier: with slicked back hair, formal styling, sophisticated men's hairstyle, business professional
